Installation
***************

DEATF requires a version of Python between 3.5 and 3.8; it also requires other libraries to be installed like: TensorFlow, DEAP, Numpy, etc. Those requirements and more information about DEATF's installation are available in its `pip webpage <https://pypi.org/project/deatf/>`_.

In order to install it, is recommended to use the pip mode: ::

    pip install deatf

Otherwise, files can be downloaded_ or cloned_ from the repository and installed by::

   python setup.py install

.. _downloaded: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/deatf/
.. _cloned: https://github.com/IvanHCenalmor/deatf
